## Block.removeInput() method

Remove an input from this block.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
removeInput(name: string, opt_quiet?: boolean): boolean;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  name | string | The name of the input. |
|  opt\_quiet | boolean | <i>(Optional)</i> True to prevent an error if input is not present. |

<b>Returns:</b>

boolean

True if operation succeeds, false if input is not present and opt\_quiet is true.

## Exceptions

{<!-- -->Error<!-- -->} if the input is not present and opt\_quiet is not true.
